snippet: The move will bring McAfee independence at a time when cybersecurity businesses have grown more prominent amid increasing hacking threats....
abstract: Intel says it has sold majority stake in its McAfee cybersecurity unit to investment firm TPG for about $4.2 billion; move will give McAfee independence.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED and QUENTIN HARDY

lead_paragraph: The move will bring McAfee independence at a time when cybersecurity businesses have grown more prominent amid increasing hacking threats.

headline.main: Intel Sells Majority Stake in McAfee Security Unit to TPG
headline.print_headline: Switching Focus, Intel Sells Majority Stake in Cybersecurity Unit to TPG
